TopicTitle: Special behind the scenes for whats to come

Articles.Content:
Hi kerbonaughts...

Around about now is my birthday. So to make a change i thought i would give a present.

Since the Kerbus testing video's i've been very busy.

So here is a behind the scene look of what most of my time has been spent doing in preparation for a few twists and surprises.

I hope you enjoy, feel free to comment.
